mapper.select: select a.cartIdx, a.cartLectureIdx, b.lectureTitle, b.lectureTeacherId, b.lectureAmount from tbl_cart a inner join tbl_lecture b on a.cartLectureIdx = b.lectureIdx where cartMemberId = #{memberId} order by cartIdx asc
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where cartMemberId = #{param1} and cartLectureIdx = #{param2}
mapper.select:
select lectureIdx, lectureTitle, lectureTeacherId, lectureThumbnailImg, lectureAmount, (select teacherName from tbl_teacher where teacherId = a.lectureTeacherId)as lectureTeacherName from tbl_lecture a where lectureIdx IN
#{lectureIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_info (orderMemberId, orderAmount, orderCreatedAt, orderUpdatedAt) VALUES (#{orderMemberId}, #{orderAmount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select orderIdx , orderMemberId , orderAmount , orderStatus, orderCreatedAt , orderUpdatedAt from tbl_order_info where 1=1 and orderIdx = #{merchantUid}
mapper.update: update tbl_order_info set orderStatus = (case when #{paymentStatus} = 's' then 's' when #{paymentStatus} = 'f' then 'p' end ), orderUpdatedAt = now() where 1=1 and orderIdx = #{paymentOrderIdx}
